column4: Hi, I'm running ubuntu 12.10 and I get this annoying bug in which the applications I open, are missing the toolbars [File, Edit,..., About], I tried changing to jwm, gnome classic, nothing helps.
In Unity, the menu bars are located on the top panel (very top of the screen, hover there to see them)
If you want to change this behaviour to a traditional one, run: sudo apt-get remove appmenu-{qt,gtk} firefox-globalmenu
